players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I will not say anything today."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. He was found dead this morning, but I remained silent to keep my identity hidden."

Diana: "I am the detective and I have evidence that Charlie is the mafioso. However, Charlie has admitted to being the mafioso and killing Bob last night. This confirms my suspicions. I suggest we all focus on finding a way to protect ourselves from any potential threats."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
